extracted-table.table-caption: List of single-site studies that provided machine learning model for predicting schizophrenia using resting-state brain patterns

caption.p: List of single-site studies that provided machine learning model for predicting schizophrenia using resting-state brain patterns

tr.td: 71: 24 SCZ, 25 healthy siblings of SCZ, 22 HC
54: 26 SCZ with history of AH, 14 SCZ without a history of AH, 28 HC
69: 34 unmedicated (17 drug-naive) SCZ + follow-up post treatment, 35 HC
68: 28 FE drug-naive SCZ, 28 family-based controls, 40 HC

table-wrap-foot.p: SCZ Schizophrenia, HC Healthy controls, AH Auditory hallucinations, FE First episode, MDD Major depression
aAccuracy of best model among several reported models
